title: Facebook Posts Search Scraper
description: Scrape posts from Facebook search results based on your query. Extract detailed information including post content, engagement metrics, and author details.

searchQuery.title: Search Query
searchQuery.description: The search query to find Facebook posts. Leave empty if using Search URL instead.

searchUrl.title: Search URL (Alternative)
searchUrl.description: Complete Facebook search results page URL. Use this instead of Search Query if you have a specific URL.

maxPosts.title: Maximum Number of Posts
maxPosts.description: The maximum number of posts to scrape from the search results. The actor will stop when this limit is reached.

postTimeRange.title: Post Time Range
postTimeRange.description: Filter posts by time range to get more recent content.

headless.title: Headless Mode
headless.description: Run browser in headless mode (no visible window). Recommended for better performance.

debug.title: Debug Mode
debug.description: Enable debug mode to save screenshots and HTML for troubleshooting.

useCookies.title: Use Facebook Cookies
useCookies.description: Use saved Facebook cookies for authentication. Required for accessing most posts.

facebookCookies.title: Facebook Cookies (JSON)
facebookCookies.description: Facebook authentication cookies in JSON format. Get these from your browser's developer tools.

proxy.title: Proxy Server
proxy.description: Optional proxy server URL for requests (e.g., http://proxy.example.com:8080)
